body_html: Good point, that's an option too. The advantage of keeping the config file in a standard location is that you can call pep8 . from anywhere in the tree and it will pick up the config for the project.
body_text: Good point, that's an option too. The advantage of keeping the config file in a standard location is that you can call pep8 . from anywhere in the tree and it will pick up the config for the project.
body: Good point, that's an option too. The advantage of keeping the config file in a standard location is that you can call `pep8 .` from anywhere in the tree and it will pick up the config for the project.
